homePageCards.title: Private Lessons
homePageCards.text: The BEST way to learn to dance. Progress at your own rate and on your own schedule.

homePageCards.title: Group Classes, Kids Classes & Online Workshops
homePageCards.text: Learn to dance and meet new friends. No partner needed!

homePageCards.title: Socials and Events
homePageCards.text: Meet Friends, have fun, and practice your new dance moves!

homePageCards.title: Weddings
homePageCards.text: From the first dance of your dreams to getting the whole wedding party in on the action.

homePageCards.title: Rentals
homePageCards.text: With 2 ballrooms and up to 12,000 SqFt of space, we can handle your event, large or small.
